title: BuidlGuidl - Intro to Ethereum Development, Build & Deploy your first dApp
description:
**Morning Workshop (10-11:45 am)**

Jump into Ethereum development with a hands-on introduction to Scaffold-ETH 2 and its powerful extension system! 

We'll show you how to set up your development environment and how to use state-of-the-art tools to deploy live apps that people can use, while introducing you to the essentials of blockchain development.

No prior experience needed—perfect for those eager to start building in Web3. Let’s get your first Ethereum dApp live!
track: [CLS] Learn How To Build On Ethereum & Capture the Flag Game, by BuidlGuidl
